services.title: Tech Support
services.description: I provide comprehensive technical support, ensuring your tools and systems run smoothly. From troubleshooting to proactive maintenance, I keep your business operations efficient and secure.

services.title: Website Development for Your Business

aboutpara: As an Educational Support Advocate currently with Tufts University, I specialize in leveraging technology to enhance learning by providing comprehensive support for enterprise-level systems including Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) platforms and Learning Management Systems (LMS). My background spans the deployment, optimization, and troubleshooting of complex hardware, software, and network infrastructures to meet the evolving needs of academic institutions. My mission is to foster educational success through innovative technological solutions that empower institutions and students alike.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Application Support, Hardware Troubleshooting, Software Troubleshooting, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Learning Management Systems (LMS)
Worked directly with logistics teams to coordinate large scale asset management.
